name: Bear (Robert Brooks)
description: 2d fully animated 2d bear game asset for game development projects. This game asset comes with a fully rigged spriter puppet, hd keyframes and vector body pieces. the keyframes are around 850 x 750 pixels in width and height, You can also use the included spriter file to reexport animationsat up to 2000 pixels in size without losing resolution, perfect if you're making 4k games.
